thumb.title: 【ARC】MORTAL KOMBAT - KANO
thumb.description: 真人快打モータルコンバットMortal Kombat T-Unit Rev.5.0.0(1992, MIDWAY)Character - Kano難易度・★★★★★ (Lvl.5, Hardest)Non-Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost===00:00 Arcade Attract Intro00:07 Character Select (Kano)00:16 Sub-Zero (Bi Han)00:57 Scorpion (Hanzo Hasashi)01:37 Sonya Blade02:12 Test Your Might - Wood02:21 Johnny Cage02:55 Raiden03:30 Liu Kang04:06 Test Your Might - Stone04:15 Kano (Mirror Match)04:52 Endurance I (Sub-Zero, Sonya)05:52 Endurance II (Cage, Scorpion)06:46 Test Your Might - Steel06:56 Endurance III (Cage, Raiden)07:51 Goro08:26 Shang Tsung (Final Stage)09:14 Ending & Credits11:33 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
